entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
